name: Petrifying Gaze
text: Try as you might, you have met the gaze of the Basilisk as your feet turn rigid.

name: Devilish Whip
text: The Devil lashes you with a giant whip studded in razor sharp spines.

name: Ice Shatter
text: The Wyrmling rears back and fires a storm of ice shards over you.

name: Self Inflicted
text: You stab yourself in the stomach with your own weapon... or is it you?

name: Impaling Sting
text: Gods, it stings, by the gods it stings. Why does such a creature exist?!

name: Wyrm Slash
text: The Wyrmling sprints to you, grasping you with razor sharp wing talons, and rends your body with claws and teeth.

name: Backstab
text: You feel the sharp end of a kris dagger sink into your spine.

name: Hell Hound
text: The only thing worse than the bite you just received is the involuntary cauterization that followed.

name: Life Sap
text: The Death Knight raises an ethereal tentacle that entangles your leg and saps your living essence.

name: Tri Assault
text: The Manticore pounces; with jaws around your neck you feel the sting of a needle enter your shoulder.

name: Bull Rush
text: That axe was not just for looks. That was not just for looks at all.

name: Unholy Trample
text: The Nightmare charges through you as if you were tissue paper.

name: Betrayal
text: Owly is that you? Owly please...

name: Apparition Sting
text: You lost track of the spider... The erie pain in your back reminds you where it went.

name: Infecting Bite
text: The Werewolf sinks its fangs into your neck, as the full moon gets brighter, and brighter.

name: Deft Strike
text: The Wight is a better swordsman than you are. Much better.

name: Freezing Bite
text: The Wolf latches onto you, chilling your arm to the bone and through the blood.
